title: Triangulation Pedagogy Workshop for Linking Mathematical Practices and Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical literacy and mathematical problem-solving experience in professional contexts
context.additional_context: A VR simulation-based experience where professionals in medical/legal/technical fields apply mathematical practices in real work environments, with critical analysis of instructional design using triangulation methodology

learning_goals: Learners can compare and evaluate various methodologies (interviews, observations, literature analysis) for mathematical practice research.
Learners design mathematical problem-solving strategies for real-world professional issues by applying a triangulation approach.
Learners can discuss the impact of mathematical practice research on instructional design through case analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
